msbt.message: It's Bunny Day, so let's par-tay!Today is gonna rock so hard. Even the weather's ready to celebrate, !
So Zipper and I have a little game we like to play.I'll sneak up behind him and grab at the zipper on his costume, and he'll yell at me sayin' it's not a costume.It's pretty funfor me, . Bwa ha ha!
Hey, you tried eatin' any of those Bunny Day eggs yet? I took a bite of one andyeah, they're pretty good!It's gonna be tough to keep the rest around for DIY stuff, .
Seen those super-colorful balloons floatin' around, ?They're pretty and all, but I really just wanna shoot a few down and find out what they're haulin'!
I saw this weird bottle on the beach. It was all colorful and stuff, like in a "Find me!" kind of wayWell, I know that prank. Not gonna fall for THAT again,

Hey, have you been on one of those Nook Miles Ticket island-tour dealies lately, ?Word is that eggs have been poppin' out of rocks out there! So wild! Think it's, like, a deserted-island thing?But, wait I'm pretty sure I saw eggs comin' out of the rocks here too. So maybe it's justan island thing. Huh!
So get this. I was takin' a break, had just sat down against a tree, anda leaf egg fell on my head!Gotta be the strangest thing I've seen shake out of a tree since that time fell on me.
You know when you go out fishin', find a good spot, cast a line, hook a big one, reel it in, andit's an egg?Well, it happened, .
